Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/analysis/statistics/Descriptive
Synopsis Descriptive Statistics.
Details geometricMean kurtosis max mean median min percentile skewness standardDeviation sum sumsq variance
Description Provides the following univariate (single variable) statistics functions:

  • geometricMean:
  • kurtosis:
  • max:
  • mean:
  • median:
  • min:
  • percentile:
  • skewness:
  • standardDeviation:
  • sum:
  • sumsq:
  • variance:
Examples 
rascal>import stat::Descriptive;
|stdin:///|(7,17,<1,7>,<1,24>): Could not load module stat::Descriptive: File rascal://stat::Descriptive not found.

rascal>D = [67, 88, 55, 92.5, 102, 51];
list[num]: [67,88,55,92.5,102,51]
rascal>mn = min(D);
|stdin:///|(5,3,<1,5>,<1,8>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: min

rascal>mx = max(D);
|stdin:///|(5,3,<1,5>,<1,8>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: max

rascal>range = mx - mn;
|stdin:///|(8,2,<1,8>,<1,10>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: mx

rascal>midrange =  mn + range/2;
|stdin:///|(12,2,<1,12>,<1,14>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: mn

rascal>sum(D);
|stdin:///|(0,3,<1,0>,<1,3>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: sum

rascal>mean(D);
|stdin:///|(0,4,<1,0>,<1,4>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: mean

rascal>geometricMean(D);
|stdin:///|(0,13,<1,0>,<1,13>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: geometricMean

rascal>standardDeviation(D);
|stdin:///|(0,17,<1,0>,<1,17>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: standardDeviation

rascal>variance(D);
|stdin:///|(0,8,<1,0>,<1,8>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: variance

rascal>percentile(D,25);
|stdin:///|(0,10,<1,0>,<1,10>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: percentile

rascal>percentile(D,50);
|stdin:///|(0,10,<1,0>,<1,10>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: percentile

rascal>percentile(D,75);
|stdin:///|(0,10,<1,0>,<1,10>): Undeclared variable, function or constructor: percentile
